Title: Erratum to: 'Models and impact of patient and public involvement in studies carried out by the Medical Research Council Clinical Trials Unit at University College London: Findings from ten case studies' [Trials., 17 (2016) (376)]
Abstract: © 2016 The Author(s).Unfortunately, the original version of this article [1] contained an error. Box 1 was omitted from the HTML version however the PDF version is fine and Box 1 can be seen there. To correct this we have included Box 1 below and will also be doing an update.
